name: The Boss Fight
description:
Made for the My First Game Jam: Winter 2019 jam, in about two weeks.

WASD/Arrows to move,
MOUSE to attack

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
To be clear, this is NOT my first game. But it is my first time messing with speech bubbles, and a few other behind-the-scenes things, like queues. They said that was allowed, so... judge appropriately I guess?

Credits:

Fonts:
"Angel" by Tangled in Destiny
"Veteran Typewriter" by Koczman Bálint
